search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hostaway (hostaway.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Hostaway can be found at: [https://www.hostaway.com/pricing](https://www.hostaway.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing - Hostaway | Short-Term, Airbnb & Vacation Rental Management ...

extracted_content.content:
[🗓️ EVENT Don't miss Hostchella 2025 happening in Austin 🤠Don't miss Hostchella 2025 in Austin Get Tickets](https://www.hostchella.com/)

[![Image 1](https://www.hostaway.com/static/10-year-en-US-559a54add46eaa0e11e712643713bd9f.svg)](https://www.hostaway.com/)

![Image 2](https://www.hostaway.com/static/18751dd5651322076e0421b8c711e2b1/d6b7d/header-stars.png)

Customized Pricing That Scales With Your Growth
-----------------------------------------------

Your business is unique and we want to hear all about it! Book a no-obligation call with us today and get a quote tailored to you and your business needs.

Your business is too important to put your trust in low-quality software.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

You need reliable tech with a full-suite of features, **200+ partner integrations and award-winning 24/7 customer support**.

Hostaway will never be the cheapest option, because cheap price = cheap tech. And we are deadly serious about building and investing in the best short-term rental software to help your business thrive.

![Image 3: Hostaway](https://www.hostaway.com/static/pricing-hero-en-US-db86e276c094dfe07820f7894cb51189.webp)

Why do successful property managers trust Hostaway?
---------------------------------------------------

60

minutes saved

per reservation

400x

listings growth

experienced by Hostaway customers

20%+

more revenue

per listing with features like Dynamic Pricing

Pricing frequently asked questions
----------------------------------

### How much does Hostaway cost?

We charge a monthly or annual rate based on your needs and the size of your business.

### What’s included in the price?

All core features of Hostaway’s platform, including our channel manager, PMS, guest communications, analytics and reporting, and direct booking websites are included. Add-ons like smart locks, dynamic pricing, and insurance are not included in your base price.

### Do you offer a free trial?

We want to be right there alongside you while you’re trying out Hostaway, so as of now, we do not offer a free trial.

Trusted By Thousands Of Successful Vacation Rental Property Managers Globally
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Zalman S

![Image 4: Hostaway review](blob:http://localhost/8b93800870389d3ff0fc5d2ad9be0b87)

Fabulous product with all the necessary features. Great customer support

kim o

![Image 5: Hostaway review](blob:http://localhost/8b93800870389d3ff0fc5d2ad9be0b87)

We found Hostaway to be the perfect option for our property management side of the business. Hostaway team went above and beyond meeting with us to get us started and through the first few months of operation. Now we deal primarily with the customer service via the app, and they get back to us immediately. They will either fix the issue we're having or we dialogue and troubleshoot to fix. They are constantly working to streamline the program for property managers in terms of calendar updates, updating listings etc. We host between 20-30 properties and they've been great to work with. Highly recommend.

Keiran G

![Image 6: Hostaway review](blob:http://localhost/8b93800870389d3ff0fc5d2ad9be0b87)

The software solves a lot of issues for me, but three core problems were solved because of Hostaway. 1) Channel distribution, 2) Automated guest communication, 3) Cleaning/task coordination.

Discover Hostaway’s flexible pricing plans for Vacation Rental Software. Choose a plan that fits your short-term rental business needs and start optimizing your property management today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is customized based on business needs and size, with monthly or annual rates. Add-ons are not included in the base price.
